solution_line_template: Each bag makes a profit of {sell_price_per_bag}-{buy_price_per_bag}=${<<{sell_price_per_bag}-{buy_price_per_bag}={profit_per_bag}>>}{profit_per_bag}
So he makes a total profit of {num_bags_sold}*{profit_per_bag}=${<<{num_bags_sold}*{profit_per_bag}={total_profit}>>}{total_profit}
